characters.name: Harry Du Bois
characters.description: A detective with amnesia, trying to solve a murder while piecing together his own identity.

characters.name: Kim Kitsuragi
characters.description: A precise and methodical lieutenant from the 41st precinct, your partner in the investigation.

characters.name: Cuno
characters.description: A foul-mouthed street kid who becomes an unlikely ally in your investigation.

characters.name: Joyce Messier
characters.description: A representative of the Wild Pines Group with crucial information about the case.

characters.name: Titus Hardie
characters.description: Leader of the Hardie Boys, a local dockworkers' union with secrets to hide.

characters.name: Evrart Claire
characters.description: A charismatic and manipulative union leader with his own agenda.

characters.name: Klaasje
characters.description: A mysterious woman staying at the Whirling-in-Rags with connections to the victim.

characters.name: The Smoker on the Balcony
characters.description: A philosophical smoker who provides unexpected insights into the nature of reality.

characters.name: Garte
characters.description: The manager of Whirling-in-Rags, trying to keep his establishment running amidst chaos.

characters.name: Ruby
characters.description: A hardened mercenary with crucial knowledge about the case's darker aspects.

characters.name: Measurehead
characters.description: A racist dockworker obsessed with phrenology and racial purity.

characters.name: Lena
characters.description: An elderly woman with a passion for cryptids and the supernatural.
